author: Long Yaohong & Zheng Guoqiao
notes: Long Yaohong and Zheng Guoqiao. The Dong Language in Guizhou Province, China. Dallas, TX: Summer Institute of Linguistics: [Arlington]: University of Texas at Arlington, 1998. ISBN 1556710518.The Tianzhu-Shidong (天柱石洞) dialect is used.
